headline: Could Investing $10,000 in Altria Make You a Millionaire?
summary: Altria (NYSE: MO) isn't a household name in the consumer staples sector, but its main brand is probably one you know.  Indeed, its Marlboro cigarette brand has a nearly 42% share of the U.S. cigarette market.  Add in a 7.3% yield backed by a growing dividend, and you can see why investors would be attracted to Altria's shares.
